description: Bagging a peak, hiking rolling trails, running rough terrain – however you move through the mountains, the Incendo Short gives you the freedom, performance and comfort to go as far as you want, as fast as you want. The lightweight, durable Teslin™ fabric provides breathable comfort, the gusseted crotch improves mobility and freedom, and the 9” inseam offers coverage without slowing your stride.
name: Arcteryx Incendo Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens
